Description: Rounded bronze axe-head: with two lugs and five drilled binding-holes. It is lightly corroded. The line of the haft is partially visible, and some of the holes bear the remains of the original binding preserved in the corrosion product. The cutting edge is not very sharp and there is no clear indication of wear.
Bibliographic references: Davies 1987 / Catalogue of Egyptian Antiquities in the British Museum (65)
